dc:title: Theophane Venard and Ho Chi Minh
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Traces the French involvement in Vietnam through the lives of the 19th century missionary Venard and the political leader Ho Chi Minh. Admits it is hard to clearly see complex historical issues where faith, persecution, power, and economics intermingle. Keywords: war
